title: continue
body: You know, we could've had anything we wanted. [[How so?]] [[That's a bit |presumptious.]]

title: How So?
body: Well, for starters, we could've... not voluntarily signed up for this. And done literally anything else. We can't have known it would turn out like [[this]].

title: presumptious
body: Is it though? There's a million and one ways to make money in the solar system. And we chose this. We can't have known it would turn out like [[this]].

title: this
body: Yeah, I know. I'm sorry. [[It's ok. I would |feel guilty too]]. [[You should be]].

title: feel guilty too
body: Yeah. Yeah. I mean, when things go wrong, it's so... easy for me to be all, "this is your fault. You could've prevented this." And then I'll play out all the things I could've done differently. ->Like? Well, like... what if another job offer came up before this, what if we'd been intercepted by another fleet? What if there was a critical engine failure before take off, and we never left? ->That's pretty unrealistic. I know. I should try to drop that line of thinking before I feel any worse. ->Yeah, I totally understand. There's no use in feeling guilty about it. It's not like there's any remedy. I know. I should try to drop that line of thinking before I feel any worse. [[...|Pause 1]]

title: You should be
body: .... That was just rude. [[I ... I didn't mean it like an |accusation]]. [[Rude, but not untrue]].

title: accusation
body: I know. That doesn't stop it from hurting. I already feel bad enough that we're here. [[...|Pause 1]]

title: Rude, but not untrue
body: I don't really need to be given a reason to feel bad. I already do. [[...|Pause 1]]

title: BEGIN
body:
CW: Death, death ideation, anxiety

This game requires mouse and click input.

Press [[here|continue]] to proceed.

title: Pause 1
body: Do you think we have any chance of rescue? [[Probably not]]. [[God, no]].

title: Probably not
body: The communication is busted, there's barely any power, and we've got no visuals on anything. None of this screams "we're gonna be juuuuuuust fine, thanks." I knew that. Then why did you ask? Some hope you'd know something I didn't. ... You're shivering. God, there goes our temp reg. Oh god. No surprise. I can't believe it lasted this long. [[...|Pause 2]]

title: God, no
body: I mean, we're on a useless hunk of metal floating free in space. It's a miracle we have oxygen left. And we can't do a single thing about it. Bingo. ... I feel like it's getting colder. I'd say it's just your imagination, but we're probably losing temp reg power, like everything else. Fuck. ... I could never stand the cold. [[...|Pause 2]]

title: Pause 2
body: We're going to die out here. ... *[[silence]]* [[Yeah]].

title: Yeah
body: [[Yeah. We're gonna die.|sob]]

title: sob
body:
*sobbing*

[[...|sorry]]
*[[shaky sigh|sigh]]*

title: sorry
body: I'm so sorry. [[Don't be]]. [[It's fine]].

title: sigh
body: I... I... ->Come here. Let's stay close. [[...|Pause 3]]

title: Don't be
body:
I'd cry too if I wasn't still in shock. I think.

[[...|Pause 3]]

title: It's fine
body:
I mean, by definition, it's absolutely not fine. But, y'know. Don't be sorry for crying.

[[...|Pause 3]]

title: Pause 3
body:
Do you remember your first trip out here?

Can't say I've gotten [[high]] in space before.
Of course! It's not [[something anyone forgets]].
The details are a [[little hazy]]. I remember what it felt like though.

title: high
body:
<i>Pffft! You know what I mean. 

Of course! It's not [[something anyone forgets]].
The details are a [[little hazy]]. I remember what it felt like though.

title: little hazy
body: Was it really that long ago? Yeah. I would've been really young. Why the curiousity? I... I don't really know. The question just sorta... popped into my head. Well, I'm happy to oblige.

title: something anyone forgets
body: Right, right, heh. Are you trying to do the whole "recall before death" thing, by any chance? Not intentionally. The question just sorta... popped into my head. I'm curious. Well, I'm happy to oblige.
